refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Allocates message using cds_malloc and initializes its content so it will be freed automatically. Pointer to the explicitly allocated data is set to data and its length is set to data_len. Message created by create_message should be freed using message_free.
Unremoved messages created this way are freed automatically in msg_queue_destroy using free_message.
Calling free_message to such message frees the message and the data given by parameter data too, thus they can NOT be freed by the caller!

refsect1.title: Return value
refsect1.para: Returns NULL on error, pointer to initialized message structure otherwise.
